name: Tengfei Jiang
body:
### About Me
I'm fourth year Ph.D student in CADCG State Key Lab, Zhejiang University. My advisors are Jin Huang and Hujun Bao. My research includes geometry processing, hexahedral meshing.

### Contact Me
* Email: jiangtengfei@zjucadcg.cn
* Address: State Key Lab of CAD&CG, Zijingang Campus, Zhejiang University, Hangzhou, 310058, P.R.China 

### Publications
 1.**L1-based Construction of Polycube Maps from Complex Shapes**  
 >Jin Huang, **Tengfei Jiang**, Zeyun Shi, Yiying Tong, Hujun Bao and Mathieu Desbrun  
 >ACM Transactions on Graphics (TOG), 33 (3) , 2014  
 >[[PDF](http://www.cad.zju.edu.cn/home/hj/14/l1-poly/l1-poly.pdf)] [[DATA](http://www.cad.zju.edu.cn/home/hj/14/l1-poly/l1-poly-dat.zip)]

 2.**Frame Field Singularity Correction for Automatic Hexahedralization**  
 >**Tengfei Jiang**, Jin Huang, Yuanzhen Wang, Yiying Tong and Hujun Bao  
 >IEEE Transactions on Visualization and Computer Graphics (TVCG), preprint, , 2014
